messages.body: Damn, I think I have done it again. Published content without first downloading it!(
And Thunder has helped me much with that: it's publishing new content as soon as you open the zite...
Good thing it's a chat and the history isn't really important in any case..
Here as nowhere else we need to check whether the site is downloaded before publishing new content :grin:
merithtk@zeroid.bit Hi! What are you interests? Let's resurrect this zite! :joy:
geekless@zeroid.bit  yeah, and it's more logical to use chats as online communication, which is not happening at all in ZeroNet nowdays -_-
and I thought my nickname was silly..
geekless@zeroid.bit who's gonna be a president of the club?
geekless@zeroid.bit by the way, I've recently started spotting websites sending notifications to a web browser even if the site's tab is closed. Can it be emulated with ZeroNet?
Like, showing mentions in the web browser even if the tab is closed.
I think, in theory, ZN engine, should be able to act like some website far away, sending same messages, on some trigger
And it should be even easier to make sound notifications for open tabs, like ZeroHello, ThunderWave etc
galleani@zeroid.bit Hi! What's that site about?
darthcitrus74@zeroid.bit ghosts of the Christmas past =P
damn, I'm feeling like a bot
